WRITING.TITLE: Is there two movies titled "The Void" that recently came out?
WRITING.TEXT: I am confused because I wanted to watch this movie called "The Void" but I am not sure if there is two different movies because I downloaded a movie called "The Void" and it is a anthology film and the one I wanted to see looks like an acutal movie. This is "The Void" that I want to see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e-OknmEs9mY

They couldn't have chosen better people to play the characters. My favorite characters are Jerome, Mooney, Nigma, Cobblepot. It was quite the joke though that Cobblepot had a bone for Nigma though, really?! I thought they were gonna do some sweet crimes together and then it turns out cobblepots gay for Nigma, pretty shitty. I do have much love for Barbara, James, Butch and Tigress as well though.
Well sorry, I rather would have easily posted this question than scroll through 200 pages of the gotham reddit to search for the same question.
Well that's crap, I want Gotham back now

WRITING.TITLE: [Everything] Why is the second part of season 3 premiering April 24th and not sooner?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering why the second half of season 3 is premiering April 24th? Is it because they are still working on it or what? This shows awesome, watched every episode back to back probably gonna re-watch it again just to get ready for the second half of season 3.

I could do a commercial for you guys. Johnny: Whoa Trevor whats that?! Trevor: I got it yesterday it's my new Fidgety Spinnerdoodle, watch this!. Music plays... "Fidget Spinner, Fidgety Spinnerdoodles, fidget spinners, just light em up!" batteries not included sold separately.
So how do I go about fixing that when there is no tracking number and the seller cant track it and is telling me to wait a full 21 days?
Well like I said its coming from USA to Canada, so do you think it could just be taking longer cause of the distance?

I did and they told me to wait a full 21 days for me to receive my item even though the expected date is well before 21 days. I just wanted to know if it would still come even though it hasnt came on the expected date?
You mean a Fidgety Spinnerdoodle?

WRITING.TITLE: If a package doesn't show up on the expected date will it still come?
WRITING.TEXT: I have been expecting a dvd for 2 weeks now and it is coming from the US to Canada. Tomorrow is the last expected delivery date for it to arrive, my question is will it still come even though it has not shown up by the last expected delivery date?

WRITING.TITLE: Is amazon not working properly again?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering if the site wasnt functioning properly again due to different things not working temporarily. I also ordered something from a third party seller that said they ship items out the next day, but they havent sent it out yet. Is it a possibility that they just couldn't update the shipping status due to the site?

Is there a possibility still of one of my items showing up? It was shipped from the US and is being delivered to Canada There is only 2 days till the deadline expected delivery date and i still havent received it. I am concerned because they shipped it using Ascendia and ive heard people havent even received their stuff.
Makes sense, that is pretty nifty.
I don't even understand how you would use a starbucks card? Can you purchase stuff from starbucks online? I thought you could only purchase things at starbucks?

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone else receive a gift card within 50 minutes of ordering it?
WRITING.TEXT: I ordered a gift card at 3:37 and received it at 4:27, usually its taken 2 to 3 days for me.
Nope this order was sold from Amazon Inc.

Well that does make me feel better that I am not alone in this situation. I think it has something to do with someone not doing their job and updating things like they should be. One thing that is very confusing is everyvtime you message customer service you get a new person to look into your order so you keep getting different answers until the issue is solved finally.

WRITING.TITLE: Amazon needs to get there shit together.
WRITING.TEXT:
I was told my order was getting shipped today and It was never shipped so I got ahold of them and they told me sorry there was a misunderstanding with your order it will be shipped within 2-3 days.When I contacted them again asking why, they got back to me and said: "There was an unexpected delay in obtaining stock of item. I'm very sorry about that. We now have stock of this item, and we're preparing your order for shipment. We'll send you an e-mail when your order ships."
How did my order go from "Preparing to ship" to "Shipping today" to there was an unexpected delay in obtaining my item when there was 5 in stock according to amazon?. I already had this problem when ordering a dvd off of Amazon inc. It took them 4 or 5 days to ship my item and they ended up sending it with purolator so I couldnt even track my package and it took way longer to receive my dvd then it should have. They said "I'm very sorry about the delay in sending your order. While looking into this, I found a problem that was preventing your order from shipping. This is corrected now, and your order will be shipping soon."
Why can't they get a simple order right? Why does the website say something in stock and then when they go to ship it there is complications? It is very frustrating
The latest amazon has shipped an item to me is 3 or 4 PM
In canada? I ordered a item yesterday and they told me it was going to be shipped today and they still havent shipped it. it is 1:35 pm here right now

WRITING.TITLE: What time does amazon ship items till?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering whats the latest they ship items in the day?
They told me it was being shipped out today and it has still not been shipped out.

So this is where writers go to get all there good ideas
I love Ros

WRITING.TITLE: Third party seller wont ship out my dvd, no reply to emails. Amazon told me to wait till passed the expected date.
WRITING.TEXT: I would just like to cancel my order because I have been waiting six days and my order still hasnt been shipped out. I contacted the third parts seller and they ignored me. I told amazon about it and they told me to wait till the passed expected date, I just want to cancel my order and get my money back but no ones working with me. I sent a request cancellation, but whats that gonna do when the seller wont even answer my messages?
it showed up shortly after I posted this at 12:30 A.m or so, all is good!
It has been 5 business days, usually they ship stuff out within 1 or 2 at the most
It hasnt showed up for me yet, I live in canada not sure if that has anything to do with it. It is 12:16 A.m here, what time are the games usually available?

So there could be a chance that they have already shipped my stuff just haven't updated the status due to it not working?

WRITING.TITLE: Is AWS still down?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering if AWS was still down cause I received a few emails I should have received but not all of them yet. And two of my orders that should have shipped already say preparing to ship still.
Ive received a few emails, but not all yet. Is it still not fully up and running still?
Thats odd, do you think it will be fine tomorrow?

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone else receiving no email notifications when sending a message to amazon or third party sellers?
WRITING.TEXT: For some reason I stopped getting email notifications from amazon when I tried contacting them about some of my orders as well as third part sellers. I used to get them all the time when Id message them up to today?
I did, and now for some reason I am not getting email notifications for the emails I send to them.
